channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - docs

item.title: Moving Gentoo docs to the wiki
item.description: Slowly but surely Gentoo documentation guides are being moved to the Gentoo Wiki. Thanks to the translation support provided by the infrastructure, all "reasons" not to go forward with this have been resolved. At first, I'm focusing on documentation with open bugs that have not been picked up (usually due â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
